title: The Prophet’s practice of I’tikaf | assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: Da'ees into only ten nights every year and that was vastly on the last ten nights of Ramadan where he used to perform I'tikaf. An I'tikaf is done in the Masjid where it's total seclusion and this is where the Muslim, especially Da'ees, who mix with people and meet them and may be affected by such meetings, they need to cleanse their souls every now and then.
